title: ГДР
overview: 1989-1990 General Secretary of the CPSU Mikhail Gorbachev begins global transformations in the USSR. He passionately desires to become a star of world politics and for this he is ready to go towards the West as far as he likes. But the restructuring he conceived led to fatal, irreversible consequences. First, the Warsaw bloc of socialist countries collapsed, followed by the collapse of the Soviet Union.
